item.description: 이름 : 황주필 (@jupil.hwang / @namoo4u) Software Architect, Cloud Platform Architect, Linux and Open Source, Container Service(Docker), Java / Kotlin, AI/ML/Bigdata, Kubernetes, Serverless, Microservice Architecture, DevOps, Blockchain/Hyperledger Fabric […ing] Kubernetes Microservices Architecture Kotlin Server side and Kotlin/native RSP / Arduino / Single Board Compute Spring Native : Spring Boot + GraalVM […]
